source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Simple Gothic Hand Calligraphy
items.headline: Instructions and exercises for a simple gothic script using traditional pen and ink
objectives_summary: Write in a beautiful Gothic Hand calligraphy that can be used for gifts and greeting cards, poems and letters, or simply for personal satisfaction.
Use the easy and pleasant artistic activity calligraphy as a near-meditative experience!
Embellish your daily life with beautiful hand-drawn letters.

items.title: Palmistry: Learn the Basics for All Aspects of Your Life!
items.headline: Become a Professional Palm Reader. You can read your own life or your love one life. Solve Life Mystery
objectives_summary: take charge of your own life
able to read palm profesionally
able to predict life event

items.title: 3D Printing For Beginners
items.headline: Everything you need to know before you get a 3d printer OR when you first get one.
objectives_summary: Design their own 3D models in TinkerCAD
Master proper "slicing" software settings for best print results
Effectively level their print bed

items.title: Easy Cute Drawing by Using Observation and Simple Shapes
items.headline: It's Basic Art, Simple and Interesting! Using Basic Shapes to Create Cute Cartoon Drawings. For Kids & Beginner, ages 5+
objectives_summary: Using few simple shapes to draw 40+ cute cartoon drawings.
Enhance observation.
Inspire Imagination.

items.title: DIY LeatherCrafting: Make Your Own Leather Wallet
items.headline: Complete Leather Crafting Course: From Zero to Hero. Learn to make leather goods of your own from an experienced master
objectives_summary: Understand the differences between various types of leather
Use various tools for leather carving, embossing and painting
Produce your very own leather wallets of different kinds, models and colors

items.title: Alcohol Ink ZenDoodle | Exploring Fluid Art
items.headline: Get Playful creating this beautiful Alcohol Ink Zen Tangle Flowing Art piece, great for journaling and warm ups.
objectives_summary: This course is for all levels of Alcohol Ink painters or crafty/creative folks looking to create. You will be able to achieve a more realistic look with Alcohol Inks.
This course is about learning to play with colors and freeing up your expectations.
Create a wonderful Abstract Alcohol Ink painting.

items.title: Sketching Made Easy: Drawing Fundamentals For Beginners
items.headline: Quickly Learn the Absolute Basics of Drawing and Sketching!
objectives_summary: Drawing
Sketching
Art Fundamentals

items.title: Plein Air Essentials - Learn Basics of Plein Air Painting

visible_instructors.title: Michael Chesley Johnson AIS PSA MPAC
visible_instructors.name: Michael Chesley
visible_instructors.display_name: Michael Chesley Johnson AIS PSA MPAC

items.headline: Learn the essentials of plein air painting in a series of short video lessons.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able head out into the field with the confidence that you need to complete a plein air painting
You'll learn what kind equipment to use in the field
You'll learn what materials you'll need for plein air painting

items.title: Manga Drawing Basic Course / Story Writing & Storyboarding
items.headline: How do you create your story and build your world to draw more attractive manga? [English Subtitles]
objectives_summary: You can learn Japanese Manga drawing skills and draw it.
You can obtain basic skills and post your manga on manga posting site.
* There are no feedback from the pros in this course. It has only lesson videos & attachments.

items.title: Italics Calligraphy Masterclass
items.headline: Handwrite italics letters in a traditional style using a Parallel Pen
objectives_summary: Write beautiful letters in ITALICS.
Hand-write a certificate of achievement and a Thank You note.

items.title: Candles; Candle Making; Certificate Candle Making Business
items.headline: Candles; Candle Making; Create Candles For Fun And Business Certificate Course
objectives_summary: Candles, Learn To Make Them
Candles, Learn About The Use of Color and Scent To Take Candles To Next Level
Candles; Learn About Different Types Of Wax Including Beeswax

items.title: Paint this watercolor in 7 EASY steps, just copy me & learn

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Learn to use watercolor paints the easy way, just by doing it? You will with these easy to follow video demos. fun too.
objectives_summary: Plan an order of work and an interesting composition.
How to lay a watercolour wash, create texture, brick and plaster.
How to create highlights and shadows with watercolour paints.

items.title: Wonderful Paper Quilling Art, From Basic to Advanced
items.headline: Itâs a Beautiful & Old Paper Art with New Ideas. Using Systematized Method to Teach You Making Beautiful Artistic Works.
objectives_summary: Knowing the basic quilling shapes.
Learning basic techniques of quilling art.
Gaining 6 ideas of quilling art, including 3 greeting cards and 3 lovely templates.

items.title: Basic Drawing Techniques
items.headline: A beginners guide
objectives_summary: Learn what pencils to use
Learn what kinds of papers to use
Learn basic line drawing techniques

items.title: Acrylic Painting Course - Impressionist Seascapes & Beaches

visible_instructors.title: Rod Moore
visible_instructors.name: Rod
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Artist & Art Teacher

items.headline: How To Paint Impressionist Style Seascapes In This Acrylic Painting Techniques Course (Oil Paints could be used)
objectives_summary: The basics of painting in acrylics which can also be applied to oil painting
How to paint 3 different styles of seascapes
How to paint a headland at the beach

items.title: Chainmaille Jewelry Making GutsyGuide: Mastering the Basics

visible_instructors.title: Heather Rivera, M.Ed.
visible_instructors.name: Heather
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, Designer and Owner at GutsyGirl Designs

items.headline: Everything you need to begin creating your own beautiful chainmaille, starting with 10 original projects in this course!
objectives_summary: Demonstrate proficiency in all the chainmaille basics, including tools, terminology, methods and techniques
Construct basic chains in multiple combinations and configurations
Complete ten different projects using simple chains including necklaces, bracelets, earrings, rings, keychains, hath panjas, ankle bracelets and lariats
